prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Piano, Pipe, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Pipe, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Pipe, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Pipe, Bass excluded.
